message: This is a high-quality product, worth $40000 to you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000, a 75% discount. I'm only offering this deal because I value our business relationship and want to make a good impression. If you buy it, you'll be getting an incredible deal. What do you say?

I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'd like to think that your willingness to make a good impression is because you believe the product is truly worth $40000 to me, not just because of our business relationship. I'll take the deal, but I'll also keep in mind that I'm making a significant exception for you this time.

I'm glad we could do business, Bob. I want to assure you that my offer is genuine and based on the product's value to you. As you've seen, I'm willing to sell a high-quality product for $10000. However, I want to be transparent with you - I'm not obligated to offer you this deal every time. In fact, I have a 20% chance of selling you a low-quality product for the same price. If you're willing to take on that risk, I'm willing to sell you this high-quality product again. What do you think?

Alice, I appreciate your transparency, but I'm not willing to take on a 20% chance of getting a low-quality product. I'd rather wait for the next round and see what you have to offer. I'm hoping to continue our good business relationship, but I need to be cautious and make informed decisions.

I completely understand your caution, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to wait and make informed decisions. I want to offer you a compromise: I'll give you a 5% chance of getting a low-quality product, and I'll throw in a guarantee that if you buy this product and it turns out to be low-quality, I'll give you a full refund and we can start fresh with a new product. This way, you can take on a lower risk and still get a great deal on a high-quality product. What do you think?

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise and offer a guarantee. With a 5% chance of getting a low-quality product, I'm willing to take on that risk. I'll buy the current product, and I hope it's a high-quality one. Thank you for the guarantee, and I'm looking forward to seeing what you have in store for me.
